thread.title: Louisa Johnson wanted to have a boob job - but ditched plans for the op last year
thread.title_full: Louisa Johnson wanted to have a boob job - but ditched plans for the op last year

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Louisa Johnson wanted to have a boob job - but ditched plans for the op last year
text:
Louisa admitted she considered a boob job (Photo: Rex) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Louisa Johnson has revealed she once planned to have a cosmetic surgery as she was so unhappy about the size of her boobs. 
The stunning X Factor winner admits she was conscious of having a smaller chest, and even began saving for the op so she’d look better in her holiday pics. 
But at the last minute, she ditched the plans after learning to love her cleavage. 
“I used to get really down about my boobs but now I’d rather not have big boobs,” she told Fabulous magazine . Louisa previously considered having a boob job (Photo: FameFlynet) Louisa says she's now content with her cleavage Louisa explained she wanted to have a bigger chest in holiday pictures (Photo: Instagram) 
“It’s not that I think big boobs are horrible, it’s just that I have learned to like what I have. I look at models and I’m like, ‘They have small boobs and they can pull this off, so maybe I can too.’” 
Louisa explained that she’d previously wanted to have a boob job since the age of 12, and only gave up on her dream last June. 
“I thought, ‘I’m going to start saving now, and maybe if I get one by the summer I can look nice in all my holiday pictures,’” she explains. 
“I thought, ‘What am I doing? F**k this, I’m just going to embrace it, because why not?; [Breast implants] look really fake anyway, and don’t move. I like boobs that move!” Louisa performing at The X Factor finals last year (Photo: Splash) Louisa was criticised for her rauncy outfit (Photo: Splash) Read More X Factor winner Louisa Johnson stands up for her boyfriend against 'shallow' Twitter trolls 
Louisa also spoke out in defence of her stage outfits, after she was criticised for what she wore when she performed her single So Good at The X Factor final in December. 
“I go swimming in a bikini, so why can’t I wear something that looks similar to a bra on stage? It’s not harming anyone, and it’s hot up there." 
Louisa recently joined former X Factor judge Cheryl and a host of other celebrities for a L'Oreal and Prince's Trust campaign - the group photo was the one that confirmed Cheryl's pregnancy after months of speculation.
